name: Tanabata (Kokiri)
description:
A cute short game about  a girl, named Ayako who wants to celebrate the tanabata festival with her crush, Haku.

"This time I won't fail. Tonight everything will be different! I feel it, Hikaboshi is with me!"

Help her to get informations about her crush by completing tasks, which help the village to prepare for the festival.

Explore the village, perhaps you will find something hidden?

Controlls
How to download

1. Download ZIP

2. Unpack

3. Start .exe

4. Enjoy the game!
